recipe.name: Appetizer: Frozen Grapefruit Appetizer
recipe.directions: Mix, freeze, break pieces up, and pour ginger ale over all.

recipe.name: Graham Crackers
recipe.directions: Combine flour, baking powder, salt, and brown sugar. Cut in margarine. Mix in honey and milk. Roll out on greased cookie sheet until about 1/4 inch thick (it is easier to roll out on a cookie sheet without sides). Score and prick with fork. Bake at 400 for 5 minutes.

recipe.name: Mustard Sauce
recipe.directions: Mix mustard and vinegar, let stand overnight. Add sugar and egg. Cook stirring constantly until thick. Remove from heat, add salt. Cool and add mayonnaise.

recipe.name: Dill Pickles

recipe.name: Frozen Peach Sauce
recipe.directions: Peel and dice peaches. Stir together and freeze. Partially thaw and serve on ice cream, shortcake, etc.

recipe.name: Frozen Jam
recipe.directions: Was and crush fruit. Stir clear jel into sugar, add to fruit. Add corn syrup. Stir until sugar dissolves. Note: When making raspberry jam, Mom uses 3 1/2 to 4 cups of sugar to stretch the raspberries.

recipe.name: Gloop
recipe.directions: In large bowl, mix glue and 11/2 cup water. In three bowls, add 1 teaspoon Borax to each third of a cup of water. Add one at a time to glue mixture. Mix with hands.
